softwareAnnouncement.headline: Introducing Vismar Aqua IT Solutions
softwareAnnouncement.description: We've spent years engineering aquaculture systems. Now, we're taking the next step‚Äîbuilding custom digital solutions for the industry. We understand aquaculture from the inside, and we write the code ourselves. That means we can develop virtually any app, platform, or tool that makes daily operations easier.

step1.title: Design
step1.description: Feasibility studies, engineering calculations, and detailed technical documentation tailored to your needs.

step2.title: Build
step2.description: Turnkey construction with our own teams and trusted partners. Equipment installation and system integration.

step3.title: Operate
step3.description: Post-commissioning support, staff training, and operational optimization to reach design capacity.

step4.title: Transfer
step4.description: Complete knowledge transfer, operational procedures, and ongoing support until full independence.

whatIsRas.title: What is RAS?
whatIsRas.description: Understanding Recirculating Aquaculture Systems and their benefits
whatIsRas.subtitle: RECIRCULATING AQUACULTURE SYSTEMS EXPLAINED
whatIsRas.content: RAS (Recirculating Aquaculture Systems) are advanced fish farming systems that reuse water through filtration and treatment, enabling sustainable and efficient aquaculture production.
